title: Red lentil and vegetable dhal
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '2 large garlic cloves, crushed', '1 green chilli, deseeded and chopped', '1 carrot, grated', '1 aubergine, chopped', '1 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 tsp mild curry powder', '2 tsp black mustard seeds', '150g red lentils (masoor dhal)', '800ml vegetable stock, hot', '1 courgette, halved and sliced', '1 large tomato, chopped', 'To garnish', 'good handful chopped fresh coriander']
